key_content: Support for three languages: English (en), Hebrew (he), Spanish (es)
Default language set to English with English fallback
React i18n configuration with Suspense disabled
XSS protection disabled in interpolation as React handles escaping natively

patterns_discovered.description: Standard i18next setup with react-i18next integration
implementation_details: Empty translation objects prepared for future content
React-specific settings applied for optimal integration

patterns_discovered.description: Hierarchical language configuration with fallback mechanism
patterns_discovered.relevance: Enables graceful language fallback and user preference management
implementation_details: Fallback language identical to default language
Translation namespace structure ready for expansion

gotchas_discovered.description: All language translation objects are initialized as empty dictionaries
gotchas_discovered.impact: No actual translations available at runtime; strings will display as their keys or undefined
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Must be populated with actual translation strings in subsequent tasks

gotchas_discovered.description: useSuspense is set to false in React configuration
gotchas_discovered.impact: i18n won't use React Suspense boundary patterns
gotchas_discovered.rationale: Likely to avoid complexity during initial setup; can be enabled later if needed

gotchas_discovered.description: XSS protection disabled at i18n level
gotchas_discovered.impact: Relies entirely on React's built-in escaping
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Safe assumption given React's native HTML escaping; acceptable practice

approach_outcome.description: Successfully created foundational i18n configuration file
approach_outcome.completeness: Complete for this task; ready for translation content population
approach_outcome.session_efficiency: Single attempt success; implementation was straightforward

recommendations.recommendation: Populate translation objects with actual translation strings
recommendations.rationale: Current configuration is a scaffold with no actual translation content

recommendations.recommendation: Integrate this config into the main application entry point
recommendations.rationale: Config must be imported and initialized before the app can use i18n

recommendations.rationale: Scales better than inline objects; easier translation management and updates

recommendations.rationale: Ensures i18n system works correctly across all supported languages

recommendations.recommendation: Document the translation structure and how to add new languages
recommendations.rationale: Facilitates future maintenance and expansion of language support
